plot: The holiday in the East: the wife carries out precision work in white overcoat operating a machine at work, the deaf husband pushes a sack barrow. But at the datcha he is the one in command...
title: Na dzialce
plot_es: The holiday in the East: the wife carries out precision work in white overcoat operating a machine at work, the deaf husband pushes a sack barrow. But at the datcha he is the one in command...
plot_en: The holiday in the East: the wife carries out precision work in white overcoat operating a machine at work, the deaf husband pushes a sack barrow. But at the datcha he is the one in command...

produce.name: Andrzej Wajda Master School of Film Directing
